Posts.Content: Jul 9, 2011 10:58AM annadisp wrote: Hi Nana:  I completely understand what you are going though.  I found out my husband is cheating with his best friends wife.   wow!!!  I was diagnosed with BC this February.  Just finished radiation and not sure chemo.  (most likely)  I knew that my husband had a close relationship with the wife "Jane" for a while but the more I asked, the more he denied anything going on.  I found pictures of the two of them together having lunch.  Still denied it.  Until I found his email password and found it ALL!!!  From a marriage proposal to pictures of them on his business trips together.  He finally admitted it and I asked for a divorce.  He recently claimed he ended it all because of what I am going through.  I feel I'm going crazy.  From images in my head of the two of them to images of me with no hair.  I'm devastated.   I'm focusing on my son at this time and letting him make a fool of himself.  I need to concentrate on me and what I'm going through with or without him.  My prayers are with you.  Take care of yourself and your children.
